hints.content:
Let's use a place value chart to write $\redD{300,000}+\tealD{1,000}+\blueD{800}+\purpleD{90}+\greenD{9}$ in standard form.

Hundred Thousands | Ten Thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens |  Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:| :-:
$\redD3$ | $0$| $\tealD1$ | $\blueD8$ | $\purpleD9$ | $\greenD9$

Now, let's break our number into parts to write it in word form:
$\goldD{301}{,}\maroonD{899}$

$\goldD{\text{Three hundred one thousand}}$ is to the left of the comma. 

 $\maroonD{\text{Eight hundred ninety-nine}}$ is to the right of the comma.

If we combine the parts, we write $301{,}899$ as three hundred one thousand, eight hundred ninety-nine.

This is the completed chart:

Standard Form | Word Form | Expanded Form
- | - | -
$301{,}899$ | Three hundred one thousand, eight hundred ninety-nine | ${300{,}000}+{1{,}000}+{800}+{90}+9$
